body:
I wonder if it would be possible to write a Radiance export plug-in  
for the free version of SketchUp.  By the way, the free version is  
not licensed for commercial use, so even if it had full export  
facilities, there would still be problems using it commercially;  
Google can afford lots of lawyers.  I wonder about research use.


Randolph


On Apr 28, 2006, at 6:45 AM, Reinhart, Christoph wrote:
